member.name: T:CalcLibrary.OperationDelegate
member.example: OperationDelegate a = (x,y)=> x + y; // handles sum operation

member.name: T:CalcLibrary.Calc
member.summary: Class Calc for calculation of simple expressions

member.name: M:CalcLibrary.Calc.AddOperation(System.String,CalcLibrary.OperationDelegate)
member.summary: Add operation to calculator for support of calculation with this operator
member.remarks: You can add only one operation per operation Char
member.exception: If operation with operationChar already exist
